title: India’s Clean Power Push Nears One-Third of Total Generation
summary: Electricity generation from non-hydrocarbon sources in India is moving closer to 33% of the total, the country’s Central Electricity Authority reported, as cited by the Times of India. title: SoftBank-backed Lenskart wobbles after volatile debut despite oversubscribed IPO
summary: One of India's most storied startup, Lenskart, listed on the exchanges today but its debut did not live up to the hype.

title: China’s Top Shale Oil Field Hits 20 Million-Ton Milestone

title: Brazil, Guyana, and Argentina Lead Next Wave of Non-OPEC Oil Production
